(Simplified: 阋)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 兒 indicates the sound; 鬥 (fight) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿵ Surround from above
    • 鬥 [ dòu ] to struggle, to fight, to contend; measuring cup
    • 兒 [ ér ] son, child
①爭吵：鬩牆(引申爲內部不和)。

鬩字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xì］
［《廣韻》許激切，入錫，曉。］
“阋1”的繁体字。亦作“1”。
(1)争吵；争斗。
(2)见“鬩蹏”。

鬩字的康熙字典解释

【亥集上】【鬥字部】　鬩； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页1457第37
【唐韻】許激切【集韻】【韻會】馨激切【正韻】迄逆切，?音赥。【說文】恆訟也。从鬥从兒，兒善訟者也。【詩·小雅】兄弟鬩于牆。【傳】鬩，很也。【爾雅·釋言】鬩恨。【註】相怨恨。【揚子·方言】脅鬩，懼也。宋衞之閒，凡怒而噎噫謂之脅鬩。　又與閴通。【易·豐卦閴其無人釋文】閴，姚作鬩，孟作窒，?通。　又【集韻】郝格切，音赫。義同。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Haiji 1】【Fighting Word Department】　阋; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 1457 Page 37
[Tang Yun] Xu Jiqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Xin Jiqie [Zheng Yun] until the reverse cut,? Yin 赥. [Said the text] Constant litigation also. Congdou Cong'er is also a good litigator. 【Poetry·Xiaoya】Brothers fought against the wall. 【Biography】Feng, very much. 【Erya·Interpretation】Hate. [Note] Phase resentment. 【Yangtze Dialect】Be fearful and fearful. Song Wei's leisure, who is angry and choking is called threatening.　 and Beitong again. [Yi·Feng Gua Cheng Qi has no one to explain] Cheng, Yao Zuocheng, Meng Zuocho, and Tong.　[Jiyun] Hao Geqi, Yinhe. The same meaning.
